6213.verse: لَكُمْ|For you|70|114|207$دِينُكُمْ|(is) your religion,|132|219|18360$وَلِىَ|and for me|91|178|11376$دِينِ|(is) my religion.`|130|174|3062$

6215.verse: وَرَأَيْتَ|And you see|102|122|18362$ٱلنَّاسَ|the people|90|131|446$يَدْخُلُونَ|entering|94|135|4491$فِى|into|48|89|89$دِينِ|(the) religion|105|146|3062$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|102|2$أَفْوَاجًا|(in) multitudes.|121|121|17768$

6216.verse: فَسَبِّحْ|Then glorify|98|106|9864$بِحَمْدِ|(the) praises|105|121|9865$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|128|1322$وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ‌ۚ|and ask His forgiveness.|180|196|18363$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|108|396$كَانَ|is|57|65|913$تَوَّابَۢا|Oft-Returning.|115|115|18364$

6219.verse: سَيَصْلَىٰ|He will be burnt|123|208|18369$نَارًا|(in) a Fire|85|254|140$ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ|of Blazing Flames,|138|223|18370$

6209.verse: I do not worship what you worship.

6210.verse: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

6211.verse: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

6212.verse: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

6213.verse: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

6214.verse: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

6215.verse: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

6216.verse: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

6217.verse: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

6218.verse: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

6219.verse: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

6220.verse: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

6221.verse: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
